long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your own meme database.
Adds a browser-action button with simple interface to store your most used memes just 2 clicks and Ctr + V away.
Extension aims for extreme minimalism for sake of faster response time.
Usage:
Write text to textbox and press "Add" button or just press enter to add text to the list. If text starts with "http" it will be considered as an image and added to secondary list with previews.
Click on any list entry to copy it to clipboard.
Shift + Click on entries will move them left/right in list.
Ctrl + Click on entries to delete them.
